thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text: I've used a variety of Mabel's Labels products and they never disappoint. They last through the beating my kids give them, countless spins through the "turbo clean" setting on my washing machine, and being dried over and over again on a medium heat setting. Seriously, these things don't come off if you use the product that matches your need. But then when you're ready to hand down the clothes that survived, there's no problem peeling them off! On top of that, the one time I contacted customer service they responded quickly, were friendly and helpful, and resolved the issue so that I was 110% satisfied. These are my go-to labels!
